mapper.select: select * from crew order by crewscore desc limit 3;
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crew c2 WHERE c2.crewscore > c1.crewscore) + 1 AS myrank FROM crew c1 WHERE crewSeq = #{crewseq}
mapper.update: update crew SET crewScore=crewScore+#{score} where crewSeq=#{crewseq}
update crew SET crewScore=crewScore-#{score} where crewName=#{crewname}
